favourite.article: Yes, dear Lord! Your Word is really, really sweet! Yes! Even sweeeeeeeeter than honey!
I am a sinner but still I am blessed that GOD is still there for me. I was lost but still GOD find ways to show me the PATH.
I know that I'm not worth because I'm so sinful but God has never given up on me. Thank God soooo much. I LOVE YOU, FATHER.

I am enjoying taking Christ one day at a time. There is a need to sing and sing and sing. This way is one of the best ways to get out of my mind and get into Christ. He is the only One that matters!!!!

Watch and Pray-the way to be delivered from temptation. The Word-our sure foundation for us to stand firm and defeat Satan's scheme. Lord, establish Yourself in us, keep us and strengthen us wholly and eternally. Amen!
I love this music so much it makes me happy when I am sad or angry. I hope you would trust me!
